title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1728 - Budget And Fiscal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1728 - Budget And Fiscal

State Regulations

Subpart 1728-1 - Budget/rent Determination Procedure (§ 1728-1.1 to 1728-1.6)

Subpart 1728-2 - Accounting And Financial (§ 1728-2.1 to 1728-2.27)

Subpart 1728-3 - Repealed

Subpart 1728-4 - Purchases And Contracts (§ 1728-4.1 to 1728-4.10)

Subpart 1728-5 - Inventory Control (§ 1728-5.1)

Subpart 1728-6 - Disposal Of Excess Equipment And Supplies (§ 1728-6.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 1728

Statutory authority: Private Housing Finance Law, §§ 31, 32, 32-a [6], 35, 84, 96

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
